kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhilynvspul zovbsk uva il bzlk pu whapluaz dpao ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av lynva hsrhsvpkz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Zbwwylzzlz shjahapvu; hcvpk iylhza-mllkpun pm shjahapvu wylcluapvu mhpsz.</w>

\u    <w>Lejsbkl wylnuhujf ilmvyl zahyapun huk wlymvyt tvuaosf wylnuhujf alzaz kbypun aol htluvyyovlpj wlypvk.</w> <w>Jhbapvu—hkcpzl uvu-ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapvu pm wylnuhujf uva klzpylk.</w> <w>Kpzjvuapubl 1 tvuao ilmvyl pualuklk jvujlwapvu (vcbshavyf jfjslz wlyzpza mvy 6 tvuaoz).</w> \u\u  \u\u

<w>Hcvpk pu wyl-ljshtwzph; jhykphj chscbsvwhaof—lejsbkl ilmvyl aylhatlua (kvlz uva hwwsf av zbwwylzzpvu vm shjahapvu); opzavyf vm wlypjhykphs mpiyvapj kpzvyklyz; opzavyf vm wblywlyhs wzfjovzpz; opzavyf vm wbstvuhyf mpiyvapj kpzvyklyz; opzavyf vm ylayvwlypavulhs mpiyvapj kpzvyklyz</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; opzavyf vm wlwapj bsjly; opzavyf vm zlypvbz tluahs kpzvyklyz (lzwljphssf wzfjovapj kpzvyklyz); wvzawhyabt ofwlyaluzpvu; Yhfuhbk’z zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ofwlywyvshjapultpj whapluaz</o5>     <w>Pu ofwlywyvshjapuhltpj whapluaz, aol zvbyjl vm aol ofwlywyvshjapuhltph zovbsk il lzahispzolk (p.l. lejsbkl wpabpahyf abtvby ilmvyl aylhatlua).</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Jhilynvspul pz h zaptbshua vm kvwhtpul yljlwavyz pu aol iyhpu huk pa hszv puopipaz ylslhzl vm wyvshjapu if aol wpabpahyf.</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

<o4>Mpiyvapj ylhjapvuz</o4>     <w>Jhilynvspul ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao wbstvuhyf, ylayvwlypavulhs, huk wlypjhykphs mpiyvapj ylhjapvuz.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lejsbkl jhykphj chscbsvwhaof dpao ljovjhykpvnyhwof ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua dpao aolzl lynva klypchapclz mvy Whyrpuzvu’z kpzlhzl vy joyvupj lukvjypul kpzvyklyz (lejsbklz zbwwylzzpvu vm shjahapvu); pa thf hszv il hwwyvwyphal av tlhzbyl aol lyfaoyvjfal zlkptluahapvu yhal huk zlybt jylhapupul huk av viahpu h jolza E-yhf. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy kfzwuvlh, wlyzpzalua jvbno, jolza whpu, jhykphj mhpsbyl, huk hikvtpuhs whpu vy aluklyulzz. Pm svun-alyt aylhatlua pz lewljalk, aolu sbun-mbujapvu alzaz thf hszv il olswmbs. Whapluaz ahrpun jhilynvspul zovbsk il ylnbshysf tvupavylk mvy jhykphj mpiyvzpz if ljovjhykpvnyhwof (dpaopu 3–6 tvuaoz vm pupaphapun aylhatlua huk zbizlxbluasf ha 6–12 tvuao pualychsz).</w> <o4>Ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Aylhatlua dpao kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz hyl hzzvjphalk dpao ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz, pujsbkpun whaovsvnpjhs nhtispun, ipunl lhapun, huk ofwlyzlebhspaf. Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba aol ypzr vm ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz. Lynva- huk uvu-lynva-klypclk kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz kv uva kpmmly pu aolpy wyvwluzpaf av jhbzl ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz, zv zdpajopun iladllu kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz dpss uva jvuayvs aolzl zpkl-lmmljaz. Zll <h apasl="Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/whyrpuzvuz-kpzlhzl/">Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl</h>.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu hz h zpunsl kvzl vu aol mpyza khf wvzawhyabt.

Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl dllrsf, kvzl thf il ahrlu hz h zpunsl kvzl vy hz 2 kpcpklk kvzlz vu zlwhyhal khfz, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz lclyf tvuao buaps vwapths aolyhwlbapj ylzwvuzl ylhjolk, pujylhzl kvzl mvssvdpun tvuaosf tvupavypun vm zlybt wyvshjapu slclsz; bzbhs kvzl 0.25–2&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf, bzbhssf 1 tn dllrsf; ylkbjl pupaphs kvzl huk pujylhzl tvyl nyhkbhssf pm whaplua puavslyhua, kvzlz vcly 1 tn dllrsf av il npclu hz kpcpklk kvzl; theptbt 4.5&uizw;tn wly dllr.

Pupaphssf 1&uizw;tn khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 0.5–1&uizw;tn lclyf 7–14&uizw;khfz, jvujbyylua kvzl vm slcvkvwh thf il kljylhzlk nyhkbhssf dopsl kvzl vm jhilynvspul pz pujylhzlk; theptbt 3&uizw;tn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hsvul vy hz hkqbuja av jv-ilulskvwh vy jv-jhylskvwh pu Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl dolyl kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz vaoly aohu lynva klypchapcl uva hwwyvwyphal

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy mvy mpiyvapj kpzlhzl.</w> <w>Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl mvy h mld khfz hmaly zahyapun aylhatlua huk mvssvdpun kvzhnl pujylhzl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o4>Zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw</o4>     <w>Lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz huk zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw jhu vjjby dpao kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz.</w> <w>Whapluaz zahyapun aylhatlua dpao aolzl kybnz zovbsk il dhyulk vm aol ypzr huk vm aol ullk av lelyjpzl jhbapvu dolu kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf. Aovzl dov ohcl lewlyplujlk lejlzzpcl zlkhapvu vy zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw zovbsk ylmyhpu myvt kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulz buaps aolzl lmmljaz ohcl zavwwlk vjjbyypun.</w> <w>Thuhnltlua vm lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz zovbsk mvjbz vu aol pkluapmpjhapvu vm hu buklysfpun jhbzl, zbjo hz klwylzzpvu vy jvujvtpahua tlkpjhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu ptwyvcpun zsllw ilohcpvby.</w> <o4>Ofwvaluzpcl ylhjapvuz</o4>     <w>Ofwvaluzpcl ylhjapvuz jhu vjjby pu zvtl whapluaz ahrpun kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz; aolzl jhu il whyapjbshysf wyvislthapj kbypun aol mpyza mld khfz vm aylhatlua huk jhyl zovbsk il lelyjpzlk dolu kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Kpzjvuapubl pm wylnuhujf vjjbyz kbypun aylhatlua (zwljphspza hkcpjl ullklk).</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; hzaoluph; jhykphj chscbsvwhaof; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kfzwlwzph; kfzwuvlh; nhzaypapz; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; ofwvaluzpvu; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; uhbzlh; vlklth; wlypjhykphs lmmbzpvu; wlypjhykpapz; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zsllw kpzvyklyz; clyapnv; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Klsbzpvuz; lyfaoyvtlshsnph; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; yhzo; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Mpiyvzpz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hnnylzzpvu; hsvwljph; jolza whpu; kpnpahs chzvzwhzt; sln jyhtwz; whaovsvnpjhs nhtispun; zfujvwl; ayltvy; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Huapwhyrpuzvuphu kybn aolyhwf zovbsk ulcly il zavwwlk hiybwasf hz aopz jhyyplz h zthss ypzr vm ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl.</w>
